title: Shop Setup
text: The PoS Admin - General Information menu should be used in preference to this menu, Admin will be removed in future releases and will not be accessible. In this section, you have the ability to edit general information about your shop. Please select the specific store for which you need to make changes. After entering the necessary information, click on "Save" to finalize your changes. If you wish to discard any modifications you made, click on "Cancel." The base language refers to the default language used in the Point of Sale (POS) system. You can modify it by selecting the desired language from the drop-down menu. For more detailed information, please refer to the "@Clerks" section.

title: Gift Settings
text: The PoS Admin - Gift Voucher Setup menu should be used in preference to this menu, Admin will be removed in future releases and will not be accessible. In this section, you can configure the printing options for gift receipts and labels. Use the drop-down menu to select the type of gift receipt or label you want to customize. It's important to note that if you need to print both the receipt and label, both must be available to the Connector to avoid unexpected results. Ensure you have compatible hardware, and for more information, refer to the POS Hardware guidelines. Once you have set all the necessary options, press "Save" to apply the changes. A confirmation message will be displayed once the changes have been successfully saved. If you choose the "Gift Label" option, you will need to select the label template from the drop-down menu. Next, you'll need to enter information for the default exchange period. Select the type (either "Number of Days" or "Until Specific Date") from the drop-down menu. If your return policy specifies a certain number of days for return, choose the "Number of Days" option and set the default exchange period accordingly. If you have a specific return date, such as for Christmas return periods, choose the "Until Specific Date" option and enter the desired date. For example, if your return policy is generally 30 days from the date of purchase, select "Number of Days" and enter "30" as the default exchange period. However, during the Christmas period, if you accept returns from January 1st to January 15th, you would need to change the period type to the 15th of January. This information will be displayed on the printed gift label. Remember to save your changes to complete the process. Please note that if you have previously set up a gift receipt to print on a gift label in the setup, you must select a label template here. If you are only printing a gift receipt, this option will not be available. Additionally, you can set the expiration period for gift certificates and credit notes. The gift certificate expiry refers to the number of days within which the certificate will be valid, and the credit note expiry determines the validity period in days for credit notes.

title: Local Currency
text: The PoS Admin - Shop Currency Rates menu should be used in preference to this menu, Admin will be removed in future releases and will not be accessible. In this section, you can view the local currency used by this shop. Please note that once set, the shop's currency cannot be changed (refer to Back Office - Shops for more details). If the shop accepts other currencies, they will be listed here along with their respective conversion rates. Local Currency - Select the desired currency from the drop-down list. This list is predefined within Imagine. Add Currency - Choose from the drop-down list to add an additional currency. This list is also predefined within Imagine. Currency Exchange Rate - Enter the exchange rate for the additional currency. This value is determined by the retailer and should be manually updated whenever there are changes in the exchange rate. For example, if you want to charge 8.5 DKK for each 1 GBP, set the Currency Exchange Rate to 8.5 and click on ADD CURRENCY. Currency Exchange Rate - This displays the list of currencies that have already been defined. To edit the exchange rate, simply click on the Currency Exchange Rate box and make the necessary changes. To remove a currency, tick the corresponding box, and upon clicking Save, the currency will be removed. Don't forget to press Save at the top of the page to finalize any changes.

title: Customer Display
text: The PoS Admin - POS Options menu should be used in preference to this menu, Admin will be removed in future releases and will not be accessible. This section provides you with the ability to configure your Customer Display settings, which are utilized in conjunction with the Customer Display widget. External Site - Select a web page that can display dynamic content or store branding. If you are linking to an insecure site (HTTP), you may need to "allow content" in the Customer Display widget if the browser blocks it. Show customer display on the monitor number - Choose the display where the External Site will automatically pop out. Please note that you need to use the K3 Imagine Chrome Extension for this feature to function. Show change for (in milliseconds) - Determine the duration for which the transaction details will be displayed to the customer. This duration is specified in milliseconds, for example, setting it to 2000ms will display the information for 2 seconds. Background Colour and Text Colour - Customize the background and text colors for the transaction details that appear on the screen. Remember to click Save to apply and finalize any changes you have made.
